lines:
You have alwachs 
been very kind, and I 
with to express my warness 
gratitude.

Thank. 
again, I remain,

your most faithfully

s. 6. Luk

de

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Handwritten letter stating that he has received a check for $600 from his father and requesting the balance due, so that he may remit payment immediately; he thanks Stearns for his kindness.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
